availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Barzillai B. Caldwell (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of Milton Caldwell and Anna Baird Caldwell. Resident of Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Harrison County in 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 127B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 485.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 110B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #9789.
"Barzillai Boaz Caldwell (1836-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial #46778619, accessed August 17, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/46778619.
